events.name: Florida State Seminoles at Duke Blue Devils

headlines.description: — Isaiah Evans scored 19 points and No. 2 Duke overcame freshman star Cooper Flagg's injury scare to rout Florida State...
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 2 Duke rolls past Florida State 100-65 following Flagg's injury scare

headlines.description: — Ian Schieffelin scored 13 of his 21 points in the second half to help No. 13 Clemson come from behind to beat Virginia 71-58 on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Schieffelin scores 21, No. 13 Clemson comes from behind to beat Virginia 71-58

headlines.description: — Chucky Hepburn scored a career-high 37 points to lead No. 19 Louisville to a 79-68 victory over Pittsburgh on Saturday night.

events.name: Miami Hurricanes at North Carolina Tar Heels

headlines.description: — Ven-Allen Lubin scored 19 points, Jae’Lyn Withers had 11 points and 10 rebounds and North Carolina beat Miami 92-73 on Saturday for its fifth straight victory, the Tar Heels' longest win streak this season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lubin leads UNC's balanced scoring in 92-73 win over Miami for Tar Heels' 5th straight victory

events.name: Syracuse Orange at Virginia Tech Hokies

headlines.description: — Freshman Ben Hammond had a career-high 21 points off the bench, he and Jaydon Young combined for 15 points in overtime, and Virginia Tech outlasted Syracuse 101-95 on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hammond, Young lead Virginia Tech to come-from-behind 101-95 OT win over Syracuse

events.name: NC State Wolfpack at Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets

headlines.description: — Baye Ndongo scored a career-high 29 points and grabbed 17 rebounds, Duncan Powell added 23 points and 10 rebounds and Georgia Tech beat N.C. State 87-62 on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ndongo has 29 points, 17 boards and Powell adds double-double in Georgia Tech's win over N.C. State

headlines.description: — Maxime Raynaud scored 26 points, including a spectacular follow slam with 8.7 seconds left, and Stanford defeated SMU 73-68 on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Raynaud scores 26 with game-sealing dunk as Stanford turns back SMU 73-68

events.name: Notre Dame Fighting Irish at Wake Forest Demon Deacons

headlines.description: — Cameron Hildreth scored 28 points, Hunter Sallis added 17, and Wake Forest slipped past Notre Dame 74-71 on Saturday night, despite trailing for most of the game.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hildreth, Sallis lead Wake Forest to 74-71 come-from-behind win over Notre Dame

events.name: Boston College Eagles at California Golden Bears

headlines.description: — Mady Sissoko had career highs with 21 points and 15 rebounds to lead California to an 82-71 victory over Boston College on Saturday night to end a five-game losing streak.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sissoko has career highs with 21 points, 15 rebounds to help Cal beat Boston College 82-71
